name: Infection Rejection
description:
You play a new microscopic bacteria that has begun to kill all other milieus acting microscopic organisms. Face wave after wave of these enemies and hold out for as long as you can. Only you can keep the DNA Helix safe form these attackers. 

All Feed back is welcome.
